DOCNAME: CASE OF SAVINSKIY AND SHEVCHENKO v. UKRAINE
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mykhaylo Buromenskiy;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE and DATE respectively and live in GPE and GPE , GPE .

CARDINAL . By a judgment of DATE ORG ( NORP міський суд ) awarded Mr Savinskiy CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL NORP hryvnias ( ORG ) in salary arrears and other payments to be paid by his former employer , the ORG company Pershotravenskoye shakhtostroyitelnoye PERSON .

CARDINAL . By a judgment of DATE the ORG ( NORP міський суд ) awarded Mr PERSON CARDINAL in salary arrears to be paid by his former employer , ORG ( ВАТ ORG завод GPE ) , a joint stock company in which the ORG holds PERCENT of the share capital . By a judgment of DATE the same court additionally ordered the debtor company to pay Mr PERSON MONEY in payments owed to him upon retirement .
CARDINAL . After the above judgments had become final , the relevant departments of ORG instituted proceedings to enforce them .

CARDINAL . Subsequently , the insolvency and later the liquidation proceedings against the debtor companies were instituted and ORG terminated the enforcement proceedings . The above - mentioned liquidation proceedings are apparently still pending .
CARDINAL . The judgments in the applicants ' favour remain unenforced .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is set out in the judgment of DATE in the case of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § DATE ) .
